basic_information.scholarship_notes: Can be awarded in one semester
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Dr. Jimme Thrash Memorial Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies pursuing a degree in Adult Education. Eligibility Requirements Graduate student Demonstrates academic achievement Demonstrates financial need Selection Process Recipient(s) of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
